@Curiosity Killed the Cat: Usually artists would fill in with other short stories on top of the main story like how side dishes are served along the main course of a dinner meal, as an analogy. The series itself isn't that long and so putting other stories in would serve to: 1- they are fillers so the whole 'ban' has more pages for the fans; 2- they are (usually) from the same artist and to showcase other works. idk if you are old enough to know this but the CDs they used to sell in stores are typically like a few hit songs in there and the rest are like 'filler' songs.

So an extra chapter in the regret.... Honestly I feel like it ended even worse for the cuck here. He would've felt like killing himself (read:feeling like shit) for a while but I would think eventually he would move on. Now not only is he taking care of a child that we all know for damn sure is not even his, he's now got a fetish of getting cucked. Even worse is that he obviously doesn't have any will to move on from his wife even after all this turmoil. So all in all, he REALLY got fucked over here.

What would I do in this situation if I found out that my wife is cheating in the world of hentai? only punishment awaits for her... heavy sexual punishment that will make her forget about the old man and take her back by force.
If it was in real life, then I'd simply file a divorce, find a better girl that I can keep my eyes on most of the time who will be honest to me and have a good life. will I remember my ex wife? I'd be like, I never got married before, she doesn't exist.
What will I do if meet her one day somewhere in the world after all this? I'll ignore her, if she begs me to come back to her? Show her my new girl/wife pictures and how we live happily. no pity for people like her. never. she must suffer. either if shes being forced onto daily or if she is all alone. that is her punishment for her sins that she did to me.
